result.arabic_text: فَمَا زَالَت تِّلۡكَ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ حَصِيدًا خَٰمِدِينَ
result.translation: 15. Tokkel too maxcol sinni abaaraanaah, tet gacan- gacsaanamak makatinnon, yirgiqeeniih orbisen buqreh (darqi kinnuk) inna ken abba haynam fanah, rabeeh bargeeh angoyyi sinni mara ken abne.
